## Official Government Tender Announcement
### Mat Rental Services for Alberta, Saskatchewan, and Manitoba Regions
#### Tender Reference Number: cb-158-43301206

**Tender Details**

* **Closing Date:** 2024-07-19T14:00:00
* **Publication Date:** 2024-07-04
* **Contract Start Date:** 2024-09-01
* **Contract End Date:** 2025-03-31

**Procurement Overview**

Employment and Social Development Canada (ESDC) is seeking a supplier to provide ad hoc mat rental services for its offices located throughout Alberta, Saskatchewan, and Manitoba. The services will include providing clean mats within 5 business days of request and responding to service calls within 2 business days.

**Objective**

The objective of this tender is to provide a reliable and efficient mat rental service to support the operations of ESDC and Service Canada in the Western Region.

**Scope of Work**

The contract will involve the provision of ad hoc mat rental services, as well as delivery and cleaning of rented mats on an as-needed basis. The supplier is expected to provide a dedicated account representative to support ESDC and Service Canada’s needs.

**Key Requirements**

* Respond to service calls within 2 business days
* Provide clean mats within 5 business days of request
* Provide a dedicated account representative to support ESDC and Service Canada’s needs

** Tender Method **

This tender will be conducted using a competitive open-bidding process. The evaluation will be based on a highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

**Notice**

This notice is for information purposes only. Interested suppliers must register and obtain the tender documentation through the Canada.ca (Government of Canada) website. The tender documentation package includes a Request for Proposal (RFP) and supporting documents that outline the tender requirements, evaluation criteria, and other essential information.

To register and obtain the tender documentation, please visit the following link: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca](https://canadabuys.canada.ca). The tender package will be available for download on the same website. [www.canadabuys.canada.ca](http://www.canadabuys.canada.ca)
